title: Universal Integration Guide
subtitle: WhatsApp Business API – Official Guide
intro: This guide was created to help any company, even without technical knowledge, correctly integrate with Meta’s official WhatsApp Business API.
objective_text: Explain step by step everything required to allow any system to officially connect to the WhatsApp Business API.
step1: Create or access a Meta Business Manager
step2: Verify the company with legal documents
step3: Create an app in Meta Developers
step4: Register a dedicated WhatsApp API number
data_list: App ID, WhatsApp Business Account ID, Phone Number ID, Permanent Token, Approved template names.
interaction_text: One interaction equals one user message plus one system reply.
